QuestionStem: Which stimulus is the cheetah responding to? Select all that apply.

options.AnswerText: A. The cheetah is responding to the motion of the wildebeest.
B. The cheetah is responding to the hunger felt inside its digestive system.
C. The cheetah is responding to its internal temperature.

CorrectFeedback: The cheetah is responding to the motion of the wildebeest, likely because it is hungry. Animals respond to both external and internal stimuli.
PartiallyCorrectFeedback: Look at the picture again. Think about why the cheetah might be chasing the wildebeest.
IncorrectFeedback: Look at the picture again. Think about why the cheetah might be chasing the wildebeest.
FinalIncorrectFeedback: The cheetah is responding to the motion of the wildebeest, likely because it is hungry. Animals respond to both external and internal stimuli.
